page.title: 12Lacock Spring Fair cont.
page.content: Mr. Sparkes and his dog were at the {Spring Fair}because you had to guess how much Mr. Sparkes' dog weighed. There was a{raffle}and a game of{darts that Mr. Gould organised. There was a {fancy dress parade}for the children. Some of the children in our school went to it. They dressed up in costumes from different countries. Linda and I did not dress up to be in the parade. The best bit of the {Spring Fair}that I liked was the{fancy {dress parade}because everyone dressd up very nice, especially my friends like Paula, Deborah and Anthea. This year the{Spring Fair}raised Â£301. The top class did some{maypole dancing}too and that was very nice.
